word_mean: 骨不连合：骨折断端未能接合
骨折端在某些条件影响下，骨折愈合功能停止，骨折端已形成假关节，主要表现为肢体活动时骨折部有明显的异常活动，而疼痛不明显的疾病。

sentence.Network_en: Objective: To study the factors causing the nonunion of lower limb fractures.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要目的: 研究下肢长骨干骨折不愈合的影响因素.

sentence.Network_en: Nonunion or delayed union remains one of the major complications of fractures.
sentence.Network_cn: 骨折最主要并发症之一是骨折不愈合或延迟愈合.

sentence.Network_en: Nonunion is cessation of normal reparative sequence of fracture healing.
sentence.Network_cn: 骨折的正常愈合过程终止,称之为骨不连.

entry.tran: (工人)不属于工会的，未加入工会的;(公司或组织)不雇用工会会员的
entry.def: Non-union workers do not belong to a trade union or labor union. A non-union company or organization does not employ workers who belong to a trade union or labor union.

example.ex: The company originally intended to reopen the factory with non-union workers...
example.tran: 公司原打算雇用不属于工会的工人重新开工。

example.ex: Management hostility is apparent in about a third of non-union workplaces.
example.tran: 在大约1/3不雇用工会会员的工作场所明显可见仇视管理层的现象。

means.word_mean: 1. not belonging to or not allowing affiliation with a trade union;
